examples.text: We suspect they are trying to hide something, hence the need for an independent inquiry.

definitions.definition: a number of days, etc. from now

examples.text: The true consequences will only be known several years hence.

wordOrigin: Middle English hennes (originally meaning ‘from here’): from earlier henne (from Old English heonan, of Germanic origin, related to he) + -s (later respelled -ce to denote the unvoiced sound).
